attributes.action: to ensure pubs and clubs are merchandised to prevent excess drinking
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The continental cafe culture has not worked this is because drinking establishments in this country are merchandised to maximise drinking(loud music/you can't talk,nowhere to put your glass down et.,ensures you drink more). On the continent you are not served unless you are seated at a table making it a more social experience.Being seated has curbed trouble at football stadia it would work for pubs/clubs
